string.value: After soaking up the sun at Florina Beach, I should start up a conversation with Riel.
Riel offered to take me to Showa Town. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Skye...
I was able to meet up with Skye. Where will I go next?
Alright, how was Florina Beach? Did you like it? Ready to go to the next spot?
Alright, I'll send you to Showa Town. It's a very interesting place with a nice view to boot.
Once you arrive there, talk to #eSkye#n, and she'll take you to another spot.
Oh yeah, if you step outside, you'll encounter very scary individuals, so if you aren't ready for them, I suggest you to stay inside.
Hey, you like it here, huh? Make yourself comfortable here~
Oh, you're here through Riel? Go have yourself a bath at the bathhouse, and you'll find yourself relieving stress.
In any case, have yourself a skewer and check out the area!
